# pozk-shuffle
Universal shuffle mining prover

- PoZK testnet prover 20: `0x0eACA2011742C5156f217F1B1d0784Fe5fBf2428`
- PoZK testnet prover 52: `0xa6B720EE1f8975551A94F2d6bea74978AFf60343`

- PoZK mainnet prover 20: `Coming soon`
- PoZK mainnet prover 52: `Coming soon`

## Serialize (ABI encode/decode)
- Inputs (bytes)
```
"uint256"

uint256, // join_pk (aggregate_keys)
```

- Publics (bytes)
```
"uint256[]"

uint256[], //deck serialize to u256 array
```

- Proof (bytes)
```
"uint256[], uint256[], bytes"

uint256[], // new_deck serialize to uint256 array
uint256[], // pkc
bytes,     // proof
```

## e.g. Hex (20 cards)
```
inputs: 0xac20f35ff1b6dcba684d5828999f680d9faa2f2f43db5bcab8ef0c8b8c2f0215
publics: 
```
